      </span>
     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10134605">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10134605">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10134605">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding More
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10134605">
          <p href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/aecontent.php?pid=353707&amp;sid=2893499">
           For recommendations beyond the core resources listed on this page, use the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/aecontent.php?pid=353707&amp;sid=2893499">
           </a>
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/aecontent.php?pid=353707&amp;sid=2893499">
            Finding Background Information
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/aecontent.php?pid=353707&amp;sid=2894859">
            Finding Articles
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/aecontent.php?pid=353707&amp;sid=2894861">
            Finding Books
           </a>
           , and
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/aecontent.php?pid=353707&amp;sid=2894875">
            Citations
           </a>
           tabs across the top.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10134605" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10133100">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10133100">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10133100">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10133100">
          <p>
           Find specific recommendations by course:
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10133100" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12325482">
              <a id="link_12325482" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/abnormalpsychology2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12325482,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12325482});">
               Abnormal Psychology (Tjeltveit)
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12325495">
              <a id="link_12325495" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/childdevelopment" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12325495,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12325495});">
               Child Development
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link25419538">
              <a id="link_25419538" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/psychofcreativity" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25419538,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25419538});">
               Psychology of Creativity
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link18467497">
              <a id="link_18467497" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/psychologyofwomen" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18467497,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18467497});">
               Psychology of Women
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10133870">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10133870">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10133870">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Articles and Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10133870">
          <div id="boxatt10133870" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12326504">
              <a id="link_12326504" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12326504,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and professional journals and books in psychology and related areas.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12326851">
              <a id="link_12326851" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12326851,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326851}); ">
               ScienceDirect College Edition Health and Life Sciences, Physical Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals published by Elsevier in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search Encompass Search by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24636792">
              <a id="link_24636792" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24636792,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24636766}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books and scholarly journals, as well as newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10134220">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10134220">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10134220">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Background Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10134220">
          <p>
           These resources can help you to brainstorm topic ideas, narrow your topic to make it more manageable, or learn background information about a topic you have picked.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10134220" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12327125">
              <a id="link_12327125" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12327125,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas, including many notable titles for psychology.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12327113">
              <a id="link_12327113" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/1435605?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12327113,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327113}); ">
               Annual Review of Psychology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Literature reviews providing summary and analysis of research in the field of psychology, published annually.  Good for an overview of the state of research on a given topic.  Full text is available online for 1950-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12327167">
              <b>
               DSM-IV-TR: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Ready Reference 616.89 A512d4 2000 (Level A)
               <br />
               Information about and criteria for the classification of mental disorders. (Published in 2000.)
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20007036">
              <b>
               DSM-5: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Ready Reference 616.89 A512d5 (Level A)
               <br />
               Information about and criteria for the classification of mental disorders. (Published in 2013.)
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10134553">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10134553">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10134553">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Citation Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10134553">
          <p>
           <strong>
            APA Style
           </strong>
           is typically preferred for psychology, but check with your professor for style requirements and recommendations to be sure.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10134553" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12328996">
              <b>
               Publication Manual of the American Psychological Association (6th ed.)
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Ready Reference 808.06615 P976m 2010 (Level A)
               <br />
               The authoritative and complete manual for APA Style.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25609735">
              <a id="link_25609735" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25609735,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25609730}); ">
               Citation Guides (Muhlenberg College)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examples of citation formatting in APA, Chicago, and MLA styles.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12488737">
              <a id="link_12488737" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12488737,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12373526}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources."  Download instructions and help available on the site.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
